ygData.subject: RE: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL... Hey Lemac: I ve NEVER seen a High Elf in court!  :) As to this laughable (but not laudable) supposed lawsuit: Below is a copy of the email that Nick
ygData.messageBody:
LOL...
Hey Lemac: I've NEVER seen a High Elf in court! :)
As to this laughable (but not laudable) supposed lawsuit:
Below is a copy of the email that Nick sent me, exactly as it appeared to me
(I've included the ENTIRE mail, for those of you that enjoy a good chuckle.

Please note in the second line of his email that he says that I can email
him when my 'daddy' stops my college payments. First of all, I don't
believe that this 'Nick' character has consulted a lawyer (at least not a
GOOD one). Secondly, even if he DID consult a lawyer, I paid for my own
education, thank you, and I believe he has given me permission to email him
anytime I want to!
This incident (that all started with Nick's irrelevant comments about
camping, and his subsequent flaming of Rebecca have gotten WAY out of hand,
and are taking up altogether too much of the bandwidth associated with this
email group.
Chuckle a little if you want....I have :)
But, PLEASE, let's move on and talk about EQ!
Sean Clark
PS: I am FACULTY at the university I have my email at, not a student :)
Here's the message that nick sent me, in it's entirety:

Obviously I have a job or I would probably be a tweaker like you. You say
job like you have ever had one, when daddy stops your college payments then
you can email me and talk. Until then this is your notice never to email me
again any further emails from you will require a 500 dollar proof reading
fee, under penalty of law of course. Thank you very much and have a nice
day.

N.H.




----- Original Message -----
From: <Sean.Clark@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>; <brutalny@...>
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 5:14 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Digest Number 79


> Hi Nick
> As you have probably already realized, your original comments are
completely
> inappropriate for the list. Furthermore, I want you to know that I find
you
> second comment (below), addressed to Rebecca to be completely
inappropriate,
> childish and unprofessional.
> Without getting into your complete lack of respect for other individuals,
> your disregard for appropriate way to address a lady, and your lack of
> intellectual ingenuity in dealing with criticism, (not to mention your
> apparent lack of maturity), I would like to suggest that you take your
crude
> language AND your lame attitude and remove yourself from this list.
> This is NOT a forum for EQ complaints, and I certainly don't recall any
> posts asking for your opinion on anything, much less you opinion on
camping.
> Grow up.
> Get a job.
> Learn to express yourself in a manner appropriate to your environment.
> Sean
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nick [mailto:brutalny@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 1:24 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 79
>
>
> From: "Nick" <brutalny@...>
>
> Since you think this is not a bitch list rebecca maybe you should leave
> bitch
>
